comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: I'm wondering if the "Photo Byron's" storefront 'sign' in this photo isn't just a (very) clever photo credit by Byron's that was added to the photo ;) Byron's had other photos of this event from this same vantage point over the years, with conventional photo credits marked on the photo.

comment.author: 36076989@N04
comment._content: If you look carefully you can see the angle is slightly off suggesting it was added to the photo.

comment.author: 38769456@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/36076989@N04] I think the off angle is due to the fact that the sign writer was drunk, on the day. Too much 'fire water'
